Project Category
Description: Type of inquiry or project (e.g. Event, Construction, Facility, Disaster Relief, Other) for this lead; used to tailor qualification flow and branching logic.

Label: Units Needed (Description)
Description: Summary of quantity and type of units required (e.g.: “2-stall restroom trailer and 10 portable toilets”).

Label: Expected Attendance/Users
Description: Number of people the facilities need to support (for events or project capacity).

Label: ADA Accessible Required
Description: Indicates if ADA-compliant (handicap accessible) facilities are needed.

Label: Additional Services Needed
Description: Other services or equipment needed beyond core rentals (e.g. tent, fencing, generator, water supply, dumpster).

Label: Other Facilities On-site
Description: Whether there are existing facilities at the site.

Label: Rental Start Date
Description: When the unit(s) will be needed on site.

Label: Rental End Date
Description: Expected end date or pickup date for the rental.

Label: Site Working Hours
Description: Working hours or access times at the site.

Label: Weekend Service Needed
Description: Indicates if service is required over the weekend.

Label: Cleaning/Restocking Needed
Description: Indicates prospect needs cleaning or restocking service.

Label: On-site Contact Name
Description: Alternate on-site contact name for coordination.

Label: On-site Contact Phone
Description: Phone number for the on-site contact.

Label: Site Ground Surface Type
Description: Ground/terrain at the drop-off location (e.g. Concrete, Gravel, Grass).

Label: Site Obstacles/Access Notes
Description: Notes on access limitations or obstacles at the site.

Label: Distance to Water Source (ft)
Description: Approximate distance from unit location to nearest water source.

Label: Distance to Power Source (ft)
Description: Approximate distance from unit location to nearest power source.

Label: Within Local Service Area
Description: Checked if location is within ~3 hours of a service hub.

Label: Consent to Partner Referral
Description: Indicates if prospect agreed to share info with partner companies.

Label: Needs Human Follow-Up
Description: Flag for AI to escalate leads needing human clarification.

Label: Quote Urgency
Description: How quickly the prospect wants a quote or follow-up.

Label: AI Call Summary
Description: Summary of the AI-qualified call details.

Label: AI Call Sentiment
Description: Assessment of prospect sentiment/tone.

Label: Needs Human Follow-Up
Description: Escalation flag carried from the lead.

Label: AI Lead Type
Description: AI‑determined category of the lead (e.g. Event, Construction, etc.)

Label: AI Classification Reasoning
Description: Explanation of the AI’s logic in classifying this lead

Label: AI Classification Confidence
Description: Confidence score (0–1) for the AI’s classification

Label: AI Routing Suggestion
Description: Pipeline or stage the AI recommends routing this lead into

Label: AI Intended Use
Description: AI‑identified intended purpose for this inquiry

Label: AI Qualification Notes
Description: Key notes from the AI’s qualification assessment

Label: Call Recording URL
Description: URL link to the recorded call

Label: Call Summary
Description: AI‑generated summary of what was discussed on the call

Label: Number of Stalls (from Call/Form)
Description: How many stalls were requested (from call or form)

Label: Event Duration Days (from Call/Form)
Description: Number of days the prospect needs the units

Label: Guest Count Estimate (from Call/Form)
Description: Estimated attendee count (optional)

Label: AI Estimated Value
Description: AI‑calculated estimate of deal value
